clientSide.stubs

Class RefereeSiteStub

  • java.lang.Object
    • clientSide.stubs.RefereeSiteStub

  • public class RefereeSiteStub
extends java.lang.Object
    Stub to the referee site

    It instantiates a remote reference to the referee site. Implementation of a client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on a communication channel under the TCP protocol.
